item.description:
Please be sure to let us know if you are coming. The restaurant needs an exact number.

Tiki toki tiki toki hoy hoy hoy!

Jetzt lass uns die Sau 'rauslassen!
Lass uns Spa√ü haben in diesem deutschen (?) Restaurant! Vorfeiern Sie die kommenden Feiertagen mit Ihrem neuen und alten Deutsch-sprechenden Freunden!

Let's have a fun time at this German(?) restaurant!
Celebrate the coming of the holidays with your new and old German-speaking friends!

This restaurant ist sehr bekannt. It is large and very popular. The atmosphere is more like an Oktoberfest tent than a romantic dining experience! So come prepared for a fun and funny atmosphere with accordian music and silly hats!
[u]Bitte- Please note that we will need an exact number for the reservation so please make sure that your RSVP is accurate before Nov. 20. Danke!
Everyone will pay their own dinner. They don't make separate checks, so I will bring a calculator!
item.name: East Side Restaurant
